power.title: Bristling Defense
power.fluff: You throw your arms wide and strike two foes, each with a different weapon

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding two melee weapons

section.name: Primary Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC (main weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] (main) + Strength modifier damage, and the primary target cannot flank you until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Secondary Target:
section.text: One creature other than the primary target

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC (off-hand weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] (off-hand) + Strength modifier damage, and the secondary target cannot flank you until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Recharge:
section.text: If you miss both attacks, you regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.

power.title: Brute Strike
power.fluff: You deliver a powerful blow that rends flesh and shatters bone

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: This power deals +1[W] damage on a critical hit.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage damage, and you immediately regain the use of this power.

power.title: Comeback Strike
power.fluff: A timely strike against a hated foe invigorates you, giving you the strength and resolve to fight on

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature either marked by you or that bloodied you since the end of your last turn

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can spend a healing surge to regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: You also gain temporary hit points equal to your Strength modifier on a critical hit.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You gain temporary hit points equal to your Strength modifier, and regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.

power.title: Driving Attack
power.fluff: You drive back your adversary with a hail of blows

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares.
You gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift the same number of squares you pushed the target, to a square adjacent to it.

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Fortitude
If the primary attack missed, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier + the number of healing surges you have spent damage, and you push the target 1 square and knock it prone.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

power.title: Flanking Assault
power.fluff: The presence of so many enemies overwhelms your foe, giving you the opporunity to land a vicious attack

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature you're flanking

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
For each ally adjacent to the target, the attack deals +5 additional damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

power.title: Harrier's Ploy
power.fluff: Your forceful attack promises your foe a pursuit that can end only when one of you is victorious

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must know either combat agility or combat superiority

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, enemies provoke opportunity attacks from you when they shift.
In addition, you gain a +2 power bonus to triggered attack rolls against the target.

power.title: Knee Breaker
power.fluff: By smashing into your opponent's legs, you make even the thought of moving painful for him

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
If the target is already slowed, it is instead immobilized (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.

power.title: Lasting Threat
power.fluff: Following up your challenge with a solid attack, you force your enemy to engage you

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC
You gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll if the target is marked by you

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is marked until the end of the encounter or until you are knocked unconscious, whichever comes first.
No mark can supersede this mark. If an effect would allow the target to remove a mark on it, it must succeed on a saving throw to remove this mark.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You mark the target until the end of your next turn.
You regain the use of this power at the start of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: While the target remains marked by this power, you deal +1[W] damage with enforce challenge against it.

power.title: Master's Edge
power.fluff: Your extensive experience helps you pick out the flaws in your opponent's technique, letting you move to meet the enemy's attacks

section.name: Target:
section.text: One enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You focus on the target until the end of the encounter.
Until the end of the encounter, you can use the Master Movement action, below:

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: The target you are focusing on willingly enters a square adjacent to an ally of yours

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make a melee basic attack against the target, or charge the target.
